product.title: Is A Camel A Mammal? | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Is a Camel a Mammal?
by Tish Rabe

The lovable Cat in the Hat is back in Is a Camel a Mammal? to show readers some of the many incredible animals that we call mammals. From the tops of mountains to under the sea, amazing mammals are everywhere. The bouncy verse by Tish Rabe and Dr. Seuss-inspired illustrations by Jim Durk will capture the reader's attention as he or she learns fact after fact about the different mammals.

Tie-in Activity: Babies and toddlers often enjoy imitating animal sounds. Make a game of it by making an animal sound and letting your baby try to imitate you. Or see if your older child can make an animal sound and you guess its name.
